sections.heading: Pretrial conferencesThe court may by special order or pursuant to local rules require the district attorney and defense counsel to participate in a pretrial conference for the purpose of:(1) Disposing of discovery motions without formal hearing when there is no objection and no prior voluntary compl
sections.text: Pretrial conferencesThe court may by special order or pursuant to local rules require the district attorney and defense counsel to participate in a pretrial conference for the purpose of:(1) Disposing of discovery motions without formal hearing when there is no objection and no prior voluntary compliance with the provisions hereof; and(2) Consideration of such other matters as may aid in the prompt and fair disposition of the charge.Added by Acts 1977, No. 515, ยง1.
